medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was evaluated due to declining kidney function, which had progressed over 26 months with a decrease in estimated glomerular filtration rate to 19 ml per minute per 1.73 mÂ².
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient has a history of HIV-1 infection, hepatitis C virus (HCV) infection, insulin-dependent type 2 diabetes mellitus, hypertension, chronic kidney disease, combined hyperlipidemia, nephrolithiasis, asthma, allergic rhinitis, mild hearing loss, gastroesophageal reflux disease, benign prostatic hyperplasia, peripheral neuropathy, depression, and anxiety. He underwent an appendectomy in childhood.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of diabetes mellitus, coronary artery disease, and blood clots.
medical_history.social_history: The patient does not smoke tobacco or use illicit drugs, drinks alcohol infrequently, lives with his husband and nephew in an urban area, and is disabled. He has previously lived in the southern and midwestern United States and has traveled to the southwestern United States and the Caribbean.
